First of all the dragon's name is Terrorbot, I thought I put that in with 
the "Calling all transformers" message. And second Rachel is one of the 
female characters Moe Halestone decided to turn over to me, she's got the 
same body structure as Airazor from the show except she's taller and he 
beast mode is a bald eagle. She acts a lot like Recon's big sister.
